name: Private Jeremy WatsonÂ¹
descriptions: Private First Class Jeremy Watson is an NCR soldier being honored during Aaron Kimball's speech in 2281.
Born in a tin shack on the outskirts of One Pine, Jeremy Watson led a difficult life. His father worked as a caravan guard on the Short Loop, and his mother braved ruins as a prospector.
Several years later was stationed at Camp Forlorn Hope where his platoon was attacked, and he took a risk to save them.

topics.response_text: I still haven't found my lucky helmet yet.
Have you seen my helmet? I can't seem to find it.

topics.topic_text: Your helmet is right over there.
topics.response_text: {confused}It's always in the last place you look. I wonder why that is.

topics.topic_text: What do you know about the President's visit?
topics.response_text: He's coming to give a big fancy speech to all of us troops stationed here at the dam.
Momma always told me not to talk to strangers, but you seem like a nice person.
That's too bad. I need it for the ceremony. I need to look my best and I need my lucky helmet.

topics.topic_text: [Lie] Do you mean the helmet I just threw off the dam?
topics.response_text: Ha ha, you big joker you. You're funny. I like you.
